title: Corsair has Fallen BEHIND. - Corsair K70 Pro Mini
description: Get $25 off all pairs of Vessi Footwear with offer code shortcircuit at    Corsair has finally released a hotswappable keyboard, but at $180, there is some steep competition. Is this the keyboard to get, or should you start your mechanical keyboard journey somewhere else?  Buy a Corsair K70 Pro Mini:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    SUBSCRIBE ON FLOATPLANE:    GET MERCH:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Should you care about Hotswap? 0:41 Unboxing 1:40 Sponsor - Vessi 2:13 Taking a look at the keyboard and RGB 3:08 Initial typing impressions 3:35 Thoughts on the stabilizers  4:40 Build quality impressions 5:20 Taking out a key switch 6:51 Typing Tests 7:47 Corsair has a lot of competition 9:30 Overall thoughts 9:57 Outro
